snippet: Butlers trained in India, now serve at the luxury suites in New York’s Pierre hotel.
abstract: Butlers trained in India, now serve at the luxury suites in New York’s Pierre hotel.
lead_paragraph: “As a certified butler from the Taj Hotels training program in New Delhi, Anupam Guha says he has waited on all manner of esteemed personages, including the former British prime minister Tony Blair and Aga Khan IV,” Jesse McKinley wrote in The New York Times.

headline.main: Where an Attaché Comes With the Room
